General.Name: INNOX Advanced Materials Co.Ltd
General.Description: INNOX Advanced Materials Co.,Ltd engages in semiconductor PKG materials and flexible circuit board materials businesses in South Korea and internationally. It offers circuit materials for smartphones, tablets, notebooks, and automobiles; adhesive materials used for semiconductor packaging; and organic light-emitting diodes for displays. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Asan-si, South Korea.
